com.aurel.track.json

Class JSONUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.json.JSONUtility

  • public class JSONUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides various helper routines to encode Java Objects into JSON objects.

      • appendStringValue

        public static void appendStringValue(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Appends a string type field. Example: fieldName:"The value of the field",.
        Special characters are properly escaped, a comma is added as the last character.
        Parameters:
        sb - - the field name and value are appended to this StringBuilder
        name - - the field name
        value - - the field value, properly escaped for JSON notation

      • appendStringValue

        public static void appendStringValue(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String value,
                     boolean last)
        Appends a string type field. Example: fieldName:"The value of the field".
        Special characters are properly escaped.
        Parameters:
        sb - - the field name and value are appended to this StringBuilder
        name - - the field name
        value - - the field value, properly escaped for JSON notation
        last - - if true, no comma is added as the last character, otherwise there will be a comma

      • appendIntegerListAsArray

        public static void appendIntegerListAsArray(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        Appends a list of integers. Example: fieldName:[1234, 5678, 9123],.
        Note: there is always a comma added in the end, so this element cannot be the last in a JSON response.
        Parameters:
        sb - - the field name and value are appended to this StringBuilder
        name - - the field name
        list - - the field value(s)

        Appends a double type field. Example: fieldName:12.08,.
        Parameters:
        sb - - the field name and value are appended to this StringBuilder
        name - - the field name
        value - - the field value

      • appendErrorsToHTMLList

        public static void appendErrorsToHTMLList(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.util.List<LabelValueBean> errors,
                          boolean last)
        Appends a JSON encoded HTML list of error messages from LabelValueBean(s). The values are ignored, only the labels are being used.
        Parameters:
        sb - StringBuilder where the text is appended
        name - the name of the property (like msg: 'the label')
        errors - the list of errors as LabelValueBean objects
        last - this is the last parameter in the JSON object

        Parameters:
        s - - Must not be null.
